snippet: The latest film version of "Wuthering Heights" stops well before the novel's story has been told, as do many of its predecessors. A scholar takes exception: "We've turned it into a romance, because that suits us,'' she says.
abstract: The latest film version of "Wuthering Heights" stops well before the novel's story has been told, as do many of its predecessors. A scholar takes exception: "We've turned it into a romance, because that suits us,'' she says.

headline.main: Brontë Quiz: Cathy Dies. Then What?
